May 1, 2021
Organous
I normally don't mind paying 25 for a PC piece, but doing so here would make her too tempting a target. This Harley at 25 is a pretty nice package of support stuff. Underworld, a 50% Super Senses, and an attack that's either a solid hit or Incapacitate. She will find life on a lot of Scientist and GCU teams for me.
